body.p: Which of the following best describes the role of a domain name?

multiple_choice.choice: Define which domains that packets from this computer are allowed to reach.
Define a shorthand name for the IP address of a computer on the Internet.
Define a shorthand name for certain files.
Define which computers supervise other computers in the domain.

response.feedback: A domain name is more about identifying a computer on the Internet.
The domain name is a human-readable shorthand name for a computer's IP address.
You need more than the domain name to identify a web page.
Domain names are a form of name, but not for files.
Domain names are part of identifying a computer on the Internet.
